text:
I got the following error, when I tried to compile to src:

Using JDK 1.4
with ant 1.5
the ouotput is:

     [echo] Compiling Source
    [javac] Compiling 324 source files to D:\xml-xindice-1.0\java\classes
    [javac] D:\xml-xindice-1.
0\java\src\org\apache\xindice\core\query\XPathQueryResolver.java:502: array 
required,
 but org.apache.xpath.compiler.OpMapVector found
    [javac]          int endFunc = pos + cmp.getOpMap()[pos+1] - 1;
    [javac]                                            ^
    [javac] D:\xml-xindice-1.
0\java\src\org\apache\xindice\core\query\XPathQueryResolver.java:502: operator - 
cann
ot be applied to java.lang.String,int
    [javac]          int endFunc = pos + cmp.getOpMap()[pos+1] - 1;
    [javac]                                                    ^
    [javac] Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
    [javac] Note: Recompile with -deprecation for details.
    [javac] 2 errors
creator: namia@hotmail.com

text:
It is the problem with using JDK 1.4, changed the JDK to 1.3 and it compiles 
happily.
creator: namia@hotmail.com
